body.bibl: Şimşek, Mehmet. “Diyarbakır Syriac Orthodox Church of the Virgin Mary and Mar Petyun Chaldean Church Libraries.” In Diyarbakir’s Documentary Cultural Heritage: Manuscripts of Syriac Orthodox Church of the Virgin Mary and Mar Petyun Chaldean Church, edited by Birgül Açıkyıldız and Nevin Soyukaya, 119–64.
